_comment_SOURCE_DIRS: List of folders to monitor. Can be simple paths or objects with per-folder config (see advanced example below)
_comment_FILES: Storage files for stats, logs, and processed file tracking
_comment_KUMA_URL: Optional: Uptime Kuma push URL for monitoring
_comment_MIN_SAVINGS_GB: Minimum GB savings required to proceed with conversion (pre-check)
_comment_SCAN_INTERVAL_MINUTES: How often to scan folders (in minutes). Global default if not using per-folder config
_comment_PARALLEL_PROCESSING: NOT YET IMPLEMENTED: Enable to process multiple folders simultaneously
_comment_advanced: Per-folder intervals will be available in next release. For now, use simple paths and SCAN_INTERVAL_MINUTES
